subject: Office Information
body:
Office Information
HOMELAND SECURITY
Dear Email Owner/Fund Beneficiary,
COMPENSATION FUNDS PAYMENT ORDER.
This is to inform you that, we have been working towards the eradication of fraudsters and scam  Artists in Africa with the help of the Organization of African Unity (OAU),  and Homeland Security  We have been able to track down so many of this scam artist in various parts of African countries and Europe, which includes (Nigeria, United Kingdom, Spain, Ghana, Cameroon and Senegal) and they are all in Government custody now, they will appear at International Criminal Court (ICC) Hague (Netherlands) soon for Criminal/Fraud Justice.During the course of our investigation, we have been able to recover so much money from these scam artists. The United Nations Anti-Crime Commission and the have ordered that the money recovered from the Scammers to be shared among 100 Lucky people around the World for compensation. This Email/Letter has been directed to you because your email address and country name was found in one of the scammer Artists file and computer hard-disk during the investigation, maybe you have been scammed. You are therefore being compensated with the sum of US$5.5million United state dollar (US$).We have arranged your payment to be paid to you directly to your bank account in your country. To receive the above fund, you are therefore advised to contact the (.Agency ) who will transfer the fund to your bank account from The Bank. We have advised the Bank Agent to open a private email address with a new number as to enable us to monitor this payment and the transfer communications to avoid further delay or misdirection of your fund. Kindly contact the (.Agency ) now with the below contact details:
Contact:  +32 460 2017 16
 Compensation Fund Transfer Dept.
Contact Email: 
accounts@bancainvestments.com
Contact him now and forward the below details to him:
1. Your Full Name:
2. Your Age:
3. Occupation:
4. Cell/Mobile Number:
Yours in Service.
Regard
Garry Ford
Please make sure you are a scam victim.

subject: Re:   Office Information
body:
Hello,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's good to know that efforts are being made to combat fraud and scams. Can you provide more details on how the funds will be transferred and what steps I need to take to ensure a smooth process?

Best wishes,
Minnie

subject: Re: Office Information
body:
Dear Minnie. I acknowledged receipt of your email, kindly contact the
account agency on is contact email address : accounts@bancainvestments.com

Kindly message him and he will give you all the step that is needed for
smooth transfer.
Best regards
Garry Ford.

subject: Re: Office Information
body:
Hello Minnie, thank you for reaching out. Could you please provide more details about the transfer process? I would like to understand how it works before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Minnie

subject: Re: Office Information
body:
Hello Minnie, There is no much process on  it,
(1) is to send your bank account details  with a copy of your ID to the
account details .

(2) The accounts agency will requested for a Beneficiary Access Card in
your name.

(3)  you will secure IMF approval.

As soon as the requested details is summited the bank will directly
transfer the funds to your accounts and the money will be in your account
less than 72 hours without any interference from any institution.
Best regards
Garry Ford

subject: Re: Office Information
body:
Hello Garry, thank you for sharing this information. Could you please provide more details on how the process works and what steps are involved after submitting the bank account details and ID copy? I'm interested in learning more about this opportunity.

Best wishes,
Minnie

subject: Re: Office Information
body:
After providing does detail the transfer will be made and the money will
successfully arrived your account. There is nothing more.
Best Regard
Garry Ford

subject: Re: Office Information
body:
Hello Garry, thank you for the update. Could you please confirm the exact amount that will be transferred and when I can expect it to arrive in my account?

Best wishes,
Minnie

subject: Re: Office Information
body:
The amount the bank will transfer to your account is $5.5million and he
will arrive your account in three working days after transfer is made
